definitions.definition: ( countable ) A process by which a task is completed ; a way of doing something (followed by the adposition of , to or for before the purpose of the process).
examples: If one method doesn't work, you should ask a friend to help you.

definitions.definition: ( acting , often "the method" ) A technique for acting based on the ideas articulated by Konstantin Stanislavski and focusing on authentically experiencing the inner life of the character being portrayed.
( object-oriented programming ) A subroutine or function belonging to a class or object .
( dated ) An instruction book systematically arranged.

main_definition: ( skateboarding , snowboarding ) Ellipsis of method air .
